description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. You take the role as an alien cowboy or a gigantic mutated brain as you fight your way through an onslaught of enemies, alone or with a friend, in this br00t4l top-down multidirectional shooter.  Awarded for "best execution" at Swedish Game Awards 2010, it features two full episodes as well as an intense survival mode, all playable either by yourself or with a friend in co-op mode.
